question: S. K. Padmadevi passed away in Bengaluru, Karnataka on 19 September 2019. What was she famous for?
option2: As an actress in the Kannada film industry
option3: As a former Union Minister from Karnataka
option4: As a jnanpith awardee novelsit from Karnataka
answer: As an actress in the Kannada film industry
explanation: S. K. Padmadevi was an Indian film actress in the Kannada film industry and Tamil-language motion pictures. Padmadevi started working in Kannada theatre in 1930 and remained active on stage till 1960. Later she was associated with All India Radio for two decades. She participated in “Bhakta Sudhama” by Kalaivani. The song “Yadukulanandanane” she sang in “Bhakta Sudhama” became popular at that time.
